message.content:
You could use this regex expression:
```
^(?!.*\.usfm)[^/\\.]*-(\w{3})
```
This will extract the 3 character code in the given format after the first dash sign. The character before the dash can be any number or letters, and the filename must end with '.usfm'. Also note that this expression does not allow any characters other than digits, upper/lower case letters or dots before the first dash.
